params.data: {% set data = [] %}{% do data.append({"Configuration For": "celeryd","Parameter":"CELERYD_OPTS","File Path":"/etc/celery/celeryd.conf","Current Value": vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data'].current_system_configuration.celeryd,"Recommended Value":vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data'].recommended_configuration.celeryd}) %}{% do data.append({"Configuration For": "sealab_wsgi","Parameter":"processes","File Path":"/etc/uwsgi.d/sealab_wsgi.ini","Current Value": vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data'].current_system_configuration.sealab_wsgi,"Recommended Value":vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data'].recommended_configuration.sealab_wsgi}) %}{% do data.append({"Configuration For": "integrations_wgsi","Parameter":"processes","File Path":"/etc/uwsgi.d/integrations_wgsi.ini","Current Value": vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data'].current_system_configuration.integrations_wgsi,"Recommended Value":vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data'].recommended_configuration.integrations_wgsi}) %}{% do data.append({"Configuration For": "RabbitMQ","Parameter":"RABBITMQ_SERVER_ADDITIONAL_ERL_ARGS","File Path":"/etc/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-env.conf","Current Value": vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data'].current_system_configuration.rabbit_mq,"Recommended Value":vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data'].recommended_configuration.rabbit_mq}) %}{{data}}

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

arguments.assessment_report:
Assessment

The assessment provides a comprehensive analysis of your system's performance and operational efficiency. It includes system details that highlight your current configuration and performance metrics. Additionally, it tracks alert trends over time, helping to identify recurring issues and potential areas for improvement. The assessment also identifies the most executed playbooks, offering insights into common tasks and workflows, as well as the most failing playbooks, which can help target troubleshooting efforts. Furthermore, it analyzes the most time-consuming playbooks to identify opportunities for optimization, and it reports on playbooks that are constantly running in debug mode, indicating potential underlying issues that need attention. Overall, this assessment aims to enhance your operational effectiveness by providing actionable insights based on data analysis.

System Details

{{vars.steps.System_Details.data}}

FortiSOAR Details

* * *

Alerts Trend


{{vars.steps.Alerts_Trends.data if (vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['fortisoar_information']['number_of_alerts_created_in_one_day'] | int !=0) or(vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['fortisoar_information']['number_of_alerts_created_in_one_week'] | int !=0) or(vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['fortisoar_information']['number_of_alerts_created_in_two_week'] | int !=0) else "
There is currently no data available to display.
"}}

Most Executed Playbooks


{{vars.steps.Most_Executed_Playbooks.data if (vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['fortisoar_information']['top_10_most_executed_playbooks']| length) != 0 else "
There is currently no data available to display.
"}}

Most Failing Playbooks


{{vars.steps.Most_Failing_Playbooks.data if (vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['fortisoar_information']['top_10_most_failing_playbooks']| length) != 0 else "
There is currently no data available to display.
"}}

Most Time Consuming Playbooks


{{vars.steps.Most_Time_Consuming_Playbooks.data if (vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['fortisoar_information']['top_10_most_time_consuming_playbooks']| length) != 0 else "
There is currently no data available to display.
" }}

Playbooks Running in Debug Mode


{{vars.steps.Playbooks_Constantly_Running_In_Debug_Mode.data if(vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['fortisoar_information']['top_10_playbooks_running_in_debug_mode']| length) != 0 else "
There is currently no data available to display.
" }}
arguments.recommendation_report:
Recommendations

* * *
{{vars.recommendation_snippet if vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['system_details']['CPU'] | int > 12 else "
Warning: Your current system configuration is below the recommended specifications. As a result, we cannot generate recommendations.
"}}

params.data: {% set data = [] %}{% do data.append({"Configuration For": "php_fpm","Parameter":"pm.start_servers","File Path":"/etc/php-fpm.d/cyops-api.conf","Current Value": vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['current_system_configuration']['php_fpm']['pm.start_servers'],"Recommended Value":vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['recommended_configuration']['php_fpm']['pm.start_servers']}) %}{% do data.append({"Configuration For": "php_fpm","Parameter":"pm.max_spare_servers","File Path":"/etc/php-fpm.d/cyops-api.conf","Current Value": vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['current_system_configuration']['php_fpm']['pm.max_spare_servers'],"Recommended Value":vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['recommended_configuration']['php_fpm']['pm.max_spare_servers']}) %}{{data}}

params.data: {% set data = [] %}{% for value in ['work_mem','wal_buffers','max_wal_size','min_wal_size','shared_buffers','max_connections','random_page_cost','effective_cache_size','maintenance_work_mem','max_parallel_workers','max_worker_processes','effective_io_concurrency','checkpoint_completion_target','max_parallel_workers_per_gather','max_parallel_maintenance_workers']%}{% do data.append({"Configutation For": "postgresql","Parameter":value,"File Path":"/var/lib/pgsql/14/data/postgresql.conf","Current Value": vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['current_system_configuration']['postgresql'][value],"Recommended Value":vars.input.params['fortisoar_health_data']['recommended_configuration']['postgresql'][value]}) %}{% endfor %}{{data}}

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

arguments.recommendation_snippet:
This section outlines key recommendations for optimizing your system’s performance and ensuring seamless operation. It covers configuring PostgreSQL for improved database efficiency and managing Celery workers for better task execution. Recommendations for sealab_wsgi and integrations_wsgi focus on enhancing web application performance. For PHP applications, adjustments to php-fpm settings are advised to boost processing speed. Additionally, establishing adequate swap space is essential for maintaining system stability, especially under heavy load. Finally, configuration tips for RabbitMQ will streamline message queuing and enhance communication between services, leading to improved performance and reliability across your system.


Note: The configuration changes below will require all services to be restarted.

PostgreSQL

Edit the /var/lib/pgsql/14/data/postgresql.conf file with the following parameters.

{{vars.steps.Postgre_SQL.data}}

PHP-FPM

Edit the /etc/php-fpm.d/cyops-api.conf file with the following parameters.

{{vars.steps.PHP_FPM.data}}

Workflow Engine and RabbitMQ


{{vars.steps.Other_Configurations.data}}

SWAP SPACE

Use the documentation for creating swap space

{{vars.steps.Swap_Space.data}}
